languages.text: {n}Вы вздрагиваете от слов провидицы. Несомненно, она имеет в виду {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}кошмары{/d}, которым пыточных дел мастера подвергли ваше тело и разум. Мускулы непроизвольно сокращаются, словно вы вновь готовитесь к неизбежной боли.{/n}

{n}You flinch at the seer's words. No doubt she is referring to the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}nightmares{/d} the torturers inflicted upon your body and mind. Your muscles contract involuntarily as if steeling themselves once more for the inevitable pain.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы вздрагиваете от слов провидицы. Несомненно, она имеет в виду {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}кошмары{/d}, которым пыточных дел мастера подвергли ваше тело и разум. Мускулы непроизвольно сокращаются, словно вы вновь готовитесь к неизбежной боли.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You flinch at the seer's words. No doubt she is referring to the nightmares the torturers inflicted upon your body and mind. Your muscles contract involuntarily as if steeling themselves once more for the inevitable pain.{/n}

{n}You flinch at the seer's words. No doubt she is referring to the nightmares the torturers inflicted upon your body and mind. Your muscles contract involuntarily as if steeling themselves once more for the inevitable pain.{/n}

languages.text: {n}眼前这位先知的话，让你不由得畏缩起来。毫无疑问，她指的是那些痛苦的折磨给你的身心带来的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}噩梦{/d}。你的肌肉不由自主地收缩着，仿佛准备再次面对无法避免的疼痛。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You flinch at the seer's words. No doubt she is referring to the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}nightmares{/d} the torturers inflicted upon your body and mind. Your muscles contract involuntarily as if steeling themselves once more for the inevitable pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前这位先知的话，让你不由得畏缩起来。毫无疑问，她指的是那些痛苦的折磨给你的身心带来的噩梦。你的肌肉不由自主地收缩着，仿佛准备再次面对无法避免的疼痛。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Reculas al oír las palabras de la vidente. No te cabe duda de que se refiere al trabajo de {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pesadilla{/d} de los torturadores sobre tu cuerpo y mente. Tus músculos se contraen de forma involuntaria, preparándose para volver a sufrir el inevitable dolor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You flinch at the seer's words. No doubt she is referring to the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}nightmares{/d} the torturers inflicted upon your body and mind. Your muscles contract involuntarily as if steeling themselves once more for the inevitable pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Reculas al oír las palabras de la vidente. No te cabe duda de que se refiere al pesadillesco trabajo de los torturadores sobre tu cuerpo y mente. Tus músculos se contraen de forma involuntaria, preparándose para volver a sufrir el inevitable dolor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは予見者の言葉にたじろいだ。彼女が言っているのは間違いなく、あなたが拷問者たちによって心身に受けた{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}悪夢{/d}のことだろう。避けられぬ苦痛にもう一度耐えるかのように、筋肉が思わず萎縮する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You flinch at the seer's words. No doubt she is referring to the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}nightmares{/d} the torturers inflicted upon your body and mind. Your muscles contract involuntarily as if steeling themselves once more for the inevitable pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは予見者の言葉にたじろいだ。彼女が言っているのは間違いなく、あなたが拷問者たちによって心身に受けた悪夢のことだろう。避けられぬ苦痛にもう一度耐えるかのように、あなたの筋肉が思わず萎縮する。{/n}
{n}あなたは予見者の言葉にたじろいだ。彼女が言っているのは間違いなく、あなたが拷問者たちによって心身に受けた{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}悪夢{/d}のことだろう。避けられぬ苦痛にもう一度耐えるかのように、筋肉が思わず萎縮する。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les paroles de la prophétesse vous font tiquer. Nul doute qu'elle fait référence aux {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}cauchemars{/d} que les tortionnaires ont infligés à votre corps et à votre esprit. Vos muscles se contractent comme pour faire face à la souffrance qu'ils savent inévitable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You flinch at the seer's words. No doubt she is referring to the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}nightmares{/d} the torturers inflicted upon your body and mind. Your muscles contract involuntarily as if steeling themselves once more for the inevitable pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les paroles de la prophétesse vous font tiquer. Nul doute qu'elle fait référence aux cauchemars que les tortionnaires ont infligés à votre corps et à votre esprit. Vos muscles se contractent comme pour faire face à la souffrance qu'ils savent inévitable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du zuckst ob der Worte der Seherin zusammen. Sie bezieht sich gewiss auf die {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}Albträume{/d}, die die Folterknechte deinem Körper und Verstand angetan haben. Deine Muskeln ziehen sich unwillkürlich zusammen, als würden sie sich erneut stählen, um dem unausweichlichen Schmerz standzuhalten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You flinch at the seer's words. No doubt she is referring to the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}nightmares{/d} the torturers inflicted upon your body and mind. Your muscles contract involuntarily as if steeling themselves once more for the inevitable pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du zuckst ob der Worte der Seherin zusammen. Sie bezieht sich gewiss auf die Albträume, die die Folterknechte deinem Körper und Verstand angetan haben. Deine Muskeln ziehen sich unwillkürlich zusammen, als würden sie sich erneut stählen, um dem unausweichlichen Schmerz standzuhalten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Medyumun sözleri karşısında irkiliyorsun. Kadının, işkencecilerin senin bedenine ve zihnine yaşattığı {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}kâbuslardan{/d} bahsettiğine şüphe yok. Kasların istemsizce kasılıyor. Sanki kendilerini bir kez daha o kaçınılmaz acıya hazırlar gibiler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You flinch at the seer's words. No doubt she is referring to the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}nightmares{/d} the torturers inflicted upon your body and mind. Your muscles contract involuntarily as if steeling themselves once more for the inevitable pain.{/n}
